summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Purple 8 oz Plastic Jar Silver Lid 6 pk with Mini Jar Review Date: 2016/01/30 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Is Dishwasher Safe': 'No', 'Unit Count': '6.0 Count'} Review Text: I love these jars, they're beautiful and are perfect for my homemade lotions, body butters and conditioner. I also bought the purple with black lids. Love them! Review Title: I love these jars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ORGANIC MONOI de TAHITI TIARE BUTTER 100 % Natural / 100% PURE BOTANICALS / UNSCENTED. 2 Fl.oz.- 60 ml. For Skin, Hair and Nail Care. "One of the most extraordinary butters for skin and hair care with Tiare flowers infusion." by Botanical Beauty. Review Date: 2016/02/10 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {} Review Text: Love it, add it to my homemade products Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kanechom Brazilian Hair Treatment With Jaborandi 35.2oz | Creme de Tratamento com Jaborandi 1kg Review Date: 2017/01/21 Store: kanechom Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'kanechom', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 4 inches; 2.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SG_B00G3MJQQ8_US'} Review Text: First time using this product. I have relaxed hair, was nervous to try it because of the bad reviews. But I'm so thankful I gave it a try. It has my hair silky soft. I'm really impressed. Obviously, not every product works the same on everyone. But this is amazing in my hair.. Which is due for a relaxer and my new growth is soft. The large jar will last me at least a few months. Its worth a try for yourself, I'm honestly in aww with this product. Hope this review is helpful for anyone who may be on the fence like I was. Review Title: was nervous to try it because of the bad reviews. But I'm so thankful I gave it ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kiloline Empty PET Plastic Spray Bottles (2-Pack) Refillable 17oz.Black Trigger Sprayer w/Mist/Stream/Off Settings Leakage-proof Review Date: 2017/11/20 Store: Kiloline Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.47 x 0.28 x 0.53 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '708022996850'} Review Text: These are Awesome sprayers.
Work perfectly for my leave in Conditioner. Will order more. Review Title: Awesome spray bottles Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sunaroma Body Butters for Skin and Hair (Cocoa Butter) Review Date: 2017/11/22 Store: SUNAROMA Product Description: ['Rich and Creamy Cocoa Butter!', 'With its chocolate aroma and hydrating properties, Cocoa Butter is a must-have for smooth skin, soft hair and kissable lips! Our Cocoa Butter is ready to use straight out of the jar, but it’s also great for homemade beauty treatments. Be sure to check out the Sunaroma store to see our full collection of essential and carrier oils. Then, try out one of our quick and easy DIY blends:', 'Whipped Body Butter Lotion:', 'Say goodbye to stretch marks and dry, irritated skin! Mix 1/2 cup of Cocoa Butter with 1/2 cup of Coconut Oil and add 1/4 cup of Jojoba Oil. Stir everything together and keep the blend in the fridge until it’s semi-solid. Whip with an electric mixer until white peaks form. Apply the lotion to your problem areas.', 'Frizzy Hair Treatment:', 'It’s time to tame your mane! Mix equal parts of Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil and use as a pomade to get frizzy hair under control. This blend also helps prevent breakage and repairs damage.', 'Deep Conditioning Scalp Treatment:', 'Soothing your itchy scalp and strengthening your hair has never been easier! Simply melt a small amount of cocoa butter and apply it to your scalp for 10-15 minutes. Then, rinse with shampoo and enjoy your beautiful hair!', 'Why Choose Our Cocoa Butter?', '- Reduces the appearance of stretch marks- Strengthens and protects hair- Perfect for DIY projects- Imported from Ghana- 100% raw and pure', 'Try Today Risk Free with Our Money Back Guarantee!', '*Supply is limited. Order today to ensure availability.', 'Order Your Butter Now and Simplify Your Beauty Routine!'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SUNAROMA', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '16.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 4 x 3.8 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'UPC': '815214001404', 'Manufacturer': 'sunaroma'} Review Text: I purchased the sweet almond and aloe Vera butter. Very impressed with both. I will order more when I run out. Review Title: I purchased the sweet almond and aloe Vera butter Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchasing behavior indicates a strong preference for natural and organic products, specifically for skincare and haircare applications. The consistent positive ratings and sentiments reveal satisfaction with items used for DIY beauty solutions, such as lotions, conditioners, and body butters. 

Common themes include a focus on hydrating properties and multi-use functionality, as seen with products suitable for both skin and hair care. The consumer displays a notable inclination towards larger containers, suggesting a desire for long-lasting products, underscoring an interest in value for money.

Quality preferences lean towards products deemed effective based on personal experiences, even when initial hesitation exists due to mixed reviews. This indicates that the individual appreciates the opportunity to try new products that may defy expectations. 

Price sensitivity appears moderate, as the consumer balances quality with cost, generally favoring items that offer benefits for DIY projects and natural ingredients, suggesting an inclination for self-sufficient beauty routines. 

Overall, this person exhibits core preferences for effective, versatile, and natural beauty products, with an openness to experimentation, particularly for those that can enhance homemade solutions.

target_interaction.title: Love these sprayers for my diy fragrances
target_interaction.text: Love these sprayers for my diy fragrances. I bought them because they’re cheaper than the other brand I got on amazon. Work great
target_interaction.title_meta: 4oz Cobalt Blue Plastic PET Boston Round Fine Mist Spray Bottles (12-Pack w/ White Sprayers); Labels Included
